meanings.definition: The act of appraising or assessing the value of something.
meanings.sent1: Her appraisements of the jewelry were thorough and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The appraisements of the house were done by a professional.
meanings.sent3: During the appraisements of the old paintings, she discovered a hidden signature.
meanings.sent4: His appraisements of people's characters were always accurate.
meanings.sent5: The appraisements of the antique furniture revealed its true worth.

meanings.definition: The result of an appraisal or assessment of value.
meanings.sent1: The appraisements showed that the car was worth more than expected.
meanings.sent2: After the appraisements, the value of the land was determined.
meanings.sent3: The appraisements of the rare coins brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent4: The appraisements of her skills led to a well-deserved promotion.
meanings.sent5: The appraisements of the artwork confirmed its authenticity.
